title: New Miscrits in Miscrian Jungle
intro: This version brings 5 New Miscrits to the Jungle, hurry up and catch them all!

sections.name: Lheon
sections.quote: Lheon is often seen sleeping under the trees, but this is a ruse. They are only pretending to sleep in order to ambush their prey

sections.name: Dark Hoghedge
sections.quote: Dark Hoghedge's anxiety at meeting strangers can sometimes cause it to act out violently when approached

sections.name: Dark Beetor
sections.quote: Dark Beetor's eerie, ultraviolet glow provides it with just enough light to hunt its prey. It is the reason why some children are afraid of the dark

sections.name: Zhakor
sections.quote: Zhakor appears to be extremely venomous, but this is not the case. Its body is brightly colored by design in order to intimidate would be attackers

sections.name: Foil Pangoleaf
sections.quote: Foil Pangoleaf's shiny exterior is distracting, which it will always use to its advantage during battle
